Understanding Cookies Cookies, small text files stored on your device, play a crucial role in ensuring a seamless and personalized browsing experience within our innovative gaming and hospitality services. Our Use of Cookies We utilize cookies for various purposes, including: - Ensuring the proper functionality of the platform - Enhancing your user experience - Analyzing platform traffic and usage Types of Cookies We implement the following types of cookies: - Essential Cookies: Essential for the proper functioning of the platform. - Analytical/Performance Cookies: Aid in analyzing platform traffic to improve performance. - Functionality Cookies: Enhance the platform's ability to remember your preferences and provide an improved user experience. pages.index: Oasis Casino Resort Home: Chile's Premier Luxury Entertainment Destination home casino restaurants hotel room book with us RESTAURANTS CASINOS HOTEL SUITES Plunge into a world of luxury Step into the Oasis Casino Resort – Chile's crowning jewel of entertainment and luxury, where the pulse of the city meets the tranquil beauty of our idyllic retreat. In the heart of a city renowned for its dynamic culture and breathtaking vistas, the Oasis Casino Resort stands as a sanctuary of indulgence for those who seek the exceptional in every aspect of their journey. Upon entering the grand facade of the Oasis Casino Resort, you are greeted with a fusion of Chile's warm hospitality and the resort’s commitment to an unparalleled luxury experience. Our casino is a paradise for enthusiasts and novices alike, offering a diverse array of games from time-honored classics to cutting-edge digital adventures. RESTAURANT CASINOS SUITES A Culinary Odyssey in Chile At the heart of Oasis Casino Resort lies a dining paradise, where the passion for exquisite flavors and culinary craftsmanship takes center stage. Our resort is home to a trio of gourmet restaurants, each dedicated to bringing the essence of world-famous cuisines directly to your table. With a steadfast commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation, we invite you to explore the diverse gastronomic landscapes of Italy, Asia, and France, all while enveloped in the luxury and beauty of our Chilean oasis. Dine with us Italian Elegance: La Cucina Classica La Cucina Classica captures the soul of Italian dining, offering a menu that celebrates the simplicity and robust flavors of Italy. From handcrafted pasta and wood-fired pizzas to sophisticated antipasti and decadent desserts, each dish is a tribute to the rich culinary traditions of Italy. Savor the authentic tastes and aromas that have made Italian cuisine beloved around the world, all while enjoying the elegant ambiance that mirrors Italy’s stylish heritage. Asian Fusion: The Silk & Spice The Silk & Spice presents a journey through Asia’s vibrant culinary culture, blending traditional techniques with contemporary flair. Experience a tapestry of tastes from the streets of Bangkok to the sushi bars of Tokyo, and the spice markets of Sichuan. Our chefs artfully combine fresh ingredients, exotic spices, and innovative cooking methods to create dishes that are as visually stunning as they are flavorful. It's a culinary exploration that spans the diverse and dynamic regions of Asia. French Gastronomy: Le Jardin Gourmet Le Jardin Gourmet invites you to indulge in the sophistication and romance of French cuisine. With a focus on seasonal ingredients and refined techniques, our menu offers a modern interpretation of classic French dishes. From sumptuous coq au vin and delicate soufflés to luxurious truffles and artisan cheeses, each creation is a work of art, designed to delight the senses and transport you to the heart of Paris. pages.privacyPolicy: Privacy Policy: Your Trust is Our Priority at Oasis Casino Resort home casino restaurants hotel room book with us Privacy Policy of Oasis Casino Resort At Oasis Casino Resort, safeguarding the privacy of your information is our utmost priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you interact with our website or services. By using our site, you signify your agreement with the practices detailed in this Privacy Policy. Information We Collect We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, and phone number, voluntarily provided on our site or during communication with us. Additionally, for analytical and statistical purposes, we may collect non-personal information, such as your IP address and browser type. How We Use Your Information Your personal information may be used to respond to inquiries, fulfill service requests, and provide updates and marketing materials if you choose to receive them. We do not share your information with third parties for marketing purposes. Data Retention We retain your data for the necessary time, preserving usage data for service analysis and improvement. Cookies We use cookies on our site to collect non-personal information, enhancing your overall browsing experience. You have control over the use of cookies through your browser settings. For more details, refer to our Cookie Policy. Data Security Rigorous security measures have been implemented to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, it's important to note that no method of data transmission over the Internet or electronic storage can be guaranteed as completely secure. Links to Other Sites Our site may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any linked site. Changes to This Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy may be updated to reflect changes in our practices or for operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any changes will be promptly posted on this page, with the revision date clearly indicated at the top.
